name: 克丽斯滕·齐恩
name_full: 克丽斯滕·齐恩 Kirsten Zien
birth_place: 加拿大,不列颠哥伦比亚省,温哥华

last_movies.title: 亲爱的白种人 第一季

introduction: Kirsten Prout was born in Vancouver, Canada, and began her career at ten-years-old. She grew up in a household completely removed from the film industry, being the daughter of a neurologist and a child therapist. She credits her early insight into behaviour as a product of her mother's background in therapy. This sensitivity led to a talent for developing characters and story, which manifested itself as a love of film, television and literature. She also enjoyed dance and martial arts, training most extensively in the latter. Met with success at an early age, Kirsten worked locally in Vancouver, guest-starring on shows such as "First Wave" (1998), "Stargate SG-1" (1997), "Cold Squad" (1998) and "The Dead Zone" (2002). Her first sizeable break in film came in 2005 when she landed the part of "Abby Miller", a young martial arts prodigy, alongside Jennifer Garner, in Elektra (2005). Kirsten performed her own stunts and utilized her past training in taekwondo, crediting the experience as one of the most challenging and rewarding of her career. Transitioning from her rebellious character, Kirsten worked on the ABC Family television series "Kyle XY" (2006) as the demure "Amanda Bloom". After the show finished its successful three seasons, Kirsten, always academically inclined, chose to attend McGill University as an English Literature major, furthering her understanding of character, story, and the written word. After returning from Montreal, Kirsten landed Summit's Eclipse, part of the hugely successful Twilight Saga, and the miniseries Seven Deadly Sins.真名： Kirsten Prout中文名：柯尔斯顿·布朗特最近出演: Amanda Bloom on Kyle XY性别:女性出生在加拿大英属哥伦比亚的温哥华（跟josh是同一个地方人，又是同年……）生日: 1990年9月28日身高：1.63米Kirsten Prout被熟知为Abby Miller（艾比 米勒）, 在2005年的电影Elektra （艾丽卡）里出演年轻的女忍者作为雇佣杀手Elektra Natchios的伙伴。 　　Elektra （艾丽卡）衍生于2003年非常流行的的电影《夜魔侠》。然而, 这个年轻的加拿大女演员在4岁就表达了对演艺的无比兴趣.9岁时, 她父母希望她能暂时放弃演艺. 但是, 这从兴趣变成了她的主要激情 , 接着只过了几年, Kirsten 得到了一份令人印象深刻的电影，电视的履历。在她出演电影Elektra (2005)之前, 她完成了 “Love Crimes of Gillian Guess”(2004年)的一个角色。 她在1998年客串电影"Cold Squad" 。并出演电视剧星际之门 "Stargate SG-1" (1997年). 她其他履历包括：Once Upon a Christmas (2000), _Twice Upon a Christmas (2001)_ , Mindstorm (2001) 和 _Wedding Dress, The (2001)_ ,露脸很多的客串 "First Wave" (1998), "Mysterious Ways" (2000) 和"Jeremiah" (2002) .最近出演: Amanda Bloom on Kyle XY不演出时, Kirsten 忙于跆拳道和田径. 她喜爱素描, 写作。经历：Prout 在10岁的时候正式开始了她的演艺生涯。高中毕业后，她在McGill University的学习了一年，主修英文文学。在接下来的夏天，prout签订了两个新的角色，作为她决定在返回学校上课前的一个“假期”。Prout有一个妹妹叫Jenn。 　　Prout 在2005年作为Jennifer Garner的“共犯”出演了电影Elektra(即《艾丽卡》)，这是她第一部正式电影处女作。她同样友情客串过一些电视秀，例如， Stargate SG-1, Cold Squad, 和 The Dead Zone。 　　2010年，Prout 将出演 The Twilight Saga(暮光之城) 系列三——Eclipse(月食) 的吸血鬼Lucy一角。
